format.name: Tag Image File Format

color.name: Tag value/offset or tag data at offset

print.tooltip: Number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageWidth direction
Number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageLength direction
The X offset in ResolutionUnits of the left side of the image
The Y offset in ResolutionUnits of the top of the image
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram

The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
The values are described using the 1931 CIE xy chromaticity diagram
Coefficients used to compute luminance Y
Coefficients used to compute luminance Y
Coefficients used to compute luminance Y
Footroom for component 1
Headroom for component 1
Footroom for component 2
Headroom for component 2
Footroom for component 3
Headroom for component 3
Exposure time, given in seconds
The focal ratio
Information specific to compressed data
The shutter speed, using the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) value
The lens aperture, using the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) value
The brigthness value, using the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) value
The exposure bias, using the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) value
The smallest F number of the lens, using the APEX (Additive System of Photographic Exposure) value
The distance to the subject, in meters
Focal length of the lens, in milimeters
Indicates the exposure index selected on the camera or input device
Digital zoom ratio when the image was shot
Minimum focal length in milimeters
Maximum focal length in milimeters

print.tooltip: Unknown minimum F number = 0/0

print.line: LensSpecification (Minimum F number in the maximum focal length)
print.tooltip: Unknown minimum F number = 0/0
Value of coefficient gamma
Indicates the altitude based on the reference in GPSAltitudeRef
Indicates the time as UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)
Indicates the time as UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)
Indicates the time as UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)
Indicates the GPS DOP (data degree of precision)
Indicates the speed of GPS receiver movement
Indicates the direction of GPS receiver movement
Indicates the reference for giving the direction of the image when it is captured
Indicates the bearing to the destination point
Indicates the distance to the destination point
Indicates horizontal positioning errors, in meters

field-def.name: Incorrect field type for this tag
Reducen resolution version of another image
field-def.tooltip: Bit 0 of the NewSubfileType tag value

field-def.name: Single page of multi-page image
field-def.tooltip: Bit 1 of the NewSubfileType tag value

field-def.name: Defines a transparency mask for another image
field-def.tooltip: Bit 2 of the NewSubfileType tag value

option.name: A single page of a multi-page image

field-def.name: ImageWidth
field-def.tooltip: Number of columns in the image

field-def.name: ImageLength
field-def.tooltip: Number of rows in the image

field-def.name: BitsPerSample
field-def.tooltip: Bit depth for each component

option.name: No dithering or halftoning has been applied to the image data
An ordered dither or halftone technique has been applied to the image data
A randomized process such as error diffusion has been applied to the image data

field-def.name: CellWidth
field-def.tooltip: The width of the dithering or halftoning matrix

field-def.name: CellLength
field-def.tooltip: The length of the dithering or halftoning matrix

field-def.name: SamplesPerPixel
field-def.tooltip: Number of components per pixel

field-def.name: RowsPerStrip
field-def.tooltip: Number of columns in the image

field-def.name: PageNumber (page number)
field-def.tooltip: Page numbers start at 0

field-def.name: PageNumber (total pages)
field-def.tooltip: Total = 0 if it is unknown

option.name: No prediction scheme used before coding
Chroma image ImageWidth = Luma image ImageWidth
Chroma image ImageWidth = 1/2 Luma image ImageWidth
Chroma image ImageWidth = 1/4 Luma image ImageWidth
Chroma image ImageLength = Luma image ImageLength
Chroma image ImageLength = 1/2 Luma image ImageLength
Chroma image ImageLength = 1/4 Luma image ImageLength

field-def.name: PhotographicSensitivity
field-def.tooltip: Sensitivity of the camera or input device when the image was shot

field-def.name: StandardOutputSensitivity
field-def.tooltip: Standard output sensitivity value of the camera or input device defined in ISO 12232

field-def.name: RecommendedExposureIndex
field-def.tooltip: Recommended exposure index value of the camera or input device defined in ISO 12232

field-def.name: ISOSpeed
field-def.tooltip: ISO speed value of the camera or input device defined in ISO 12232

field-def.name: ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy
field-def.tooltip: ISO speed latitude yyy value of the camera or input device defined in ISO 12232

field-def.name: ISOSpeedLatitudezzz
field-def.tooltip: ISO speed latitude zzz value of the camera or input device defined in ISO 12232

field-def.name: Flash (flash fired)
field-def.tooltip: Flash fired (Flash bit 0)

field-def.name: Flash (flash return)
field-def.tooltip: Flash return (Flash bits 1 and 2)

field-def.name: Flash (flash mode)
field-def.tooltip: Flash mode (Flash bits 3 and 4)

field-def.name: Flash (flash function)
field-def.tooltip: Flash function (Flash bit 5)

field-def.name: Flash (red-eye mode)

option.name: No red-eye reduction mode or unknown

field-def.tooltip: Red-eye mode (Flash bit 6)

field-def.name: PixelXDimension
field-def.tooltip: Valid width of the meaningful image

field-def.name: PixelYDimension
field-def.tooltip: Valid height of the meaningful image

field-def.name: SubjectLocation
field-def.tooltip: X column number - Y row number

field-def.name: FocalLengthIn35mmFilm
field-def.tooltip: Focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in milimeters

field-def.name: LensSpecification (Minimum F number in the minimum focal length)
LensSpecification (Minimum F number in the maximum focal length)

format.details: Recognized tags (in hex): Standard TIFF: FE-103, 106-10A, 10D-112, 115-11F, 128, 129, 131, 132, 13B-13F, 201, 202, 211-214, 8298, 8769, 8825 Exif-specific: 829A, 829D, 8822, 8824, 8827, 8830-8835, 9000, 9003, 9004, 9101, 9102, 9201-920A, 927C, 9286, 9290-9292, A000-A004, A210, A214, A215, A217, A300-A302, A401-A40A, A40C, A420, A430-A435, A500 Exif GPSInfo-specific: 0-1F The MakerNote tag (of any manufacturer) is not interpreted The MakerNote, UserComment, GPSProcessingMethod and GPSAreaInformation tags are treated as ASCII tags, even though they are UNDEFINED The following checks are not implemented: - Tags in an IFD are in ascending order
